channel.title: Bitwise AND/OR assignment for 194
channel.description:
Hi guys. I'm working on player updating for 194 but have run into a mathematical wall.
In 317, there is this check: [code=Java]if((updateType & 0x40) != 0) updateType += stream.getUnsignedByte() << 8;[/code]
However in 194 there is this check: [code=Java]if ((updateType & 0x80) == 128) updateType += stream.getUnsignedByte() << 8;[/code]
So where a 317 server does this: [code=Java]if (mask >= 0x100) { mask |= 0x40;[/code]
what would I do for a 194 server?
